extendedInfo.description: Our career decision maker app helps you choose between two different occupations. This is a fast and easy way to make a career decision. Enter two different career choices. Select the attributes that are important to in choosing your career. For example, income, helping people working close to home. You can even add your own custom attributes. You can add as many custom attributes as you like. After selecting your attributes our app will allow you to rate their importance on a scale from 1-10. When your done you will see which career is best for you.

reviews.title: Great career decision maker
reviews.comment: Very fun and helpful app for making a career decision.
reviews.author: Bruce Gillies
